DOC.brief_summary: This study several part . One part examine influence factor personality past experience reaction unpleasant stimulus . Others examine effect personality emotional attentional state learn memory . When confront fearful unpleasant event , people develop fear specific cue associate event well environmental context event occur via process call classical conditioning . Classical conditioning use model anxiety disorder , relationship stress anxiety condition response remain unclear . This study examine relationship cue condition context conditioning . This study also explore acquisition retention different type motor , emotional , cognitive associative process various task range mildly arouse stressful .
DOC.detailed_description: Objective : Fear anxiety adaptive response different type threat . Fear short-duration response evoke explicit threat cue . Fear best study use Pavlovian fear conditioning . Studies 1 2 examine learning process underlie fear condition well influence cognitive affective process learn process . Anxiety sustain state apprehension evoke unpredictable threat . Study 2 examines interaction anxiety induce experimentally cognitive process . Specifically , seek 1 ) characterize effect anxiety key cognitive process include work memory , attention control , conflict , learn memory . 2 ) examine extent performance cognitive task distract anxiety , 3 ) physical exertion influence anxiety effect cognition . Study 3 examines effect memory retrieval extinction . Study population : This more-than-minimal-risk protocol test medically psychiatrically healthy volunteer age 18-50 . Pregnant nursing woman exclude . Method : Fear anxiety measure use startle reflex brief loud sound . Fear condition assess use shock unconditioned stimulus . Cognitive performance examine period unpredictable shock anticipation prior give speech . Outcome measure : The study include cognitive performance measure aversive state , primarily startle reflex .
DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA : Males female Age 1850 EXCLUSION CRITERIA : Pregnancy Any current ongoing medical illness Current Axis I disorder Past significant psychiatric disorder ( e.g. , psychotic disorder ) accord DSMIV Current alcohol substance abuse accord DSMIV criterion History alcohol substance dependence base DSMIV criterion within 6 month prior screen Current psychotropic medication use Current past organic central nervous system disorder , include limited seizure disorder neurological symptom wrist arm ( e.g. , carpal tunnel syndrome ) . The latter exclusion shock study . Negative urine toxicology screen For exercise substudy : History exercise intolerance History heart disease History pulmonary disease , control , nonexerciseinduced asthma History uncontrolled diabetes Resting heart rate > 90 BPM Resting systolic blood pressure > 140 mmHg diastolic blood pressure > 90 mmHg Peripheral condition make completion exercise protocol impossible , severe osteoarthritis chronic pain Clinically significant abnormal EKG determine MD DNP
